website_summaries.verdict: Cool all-black design with a skull and crossbones that kids will love.
pros: Size 5 ball that will work well for practice or for recreational games
Also works well as a display ball
Black color holds up nicely over time and repeated use
Delivers a solid quality for the price you'll pay
cons: Tends to lose air during use, requiring frequent reinflation

customer_reviews.title: Sticky discolored ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball has a white substance on it that does not go away with running water. It's kinda sticky and will leave a residue on your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: ROADHOG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design!
customer_reviews.text: Original rugby ball - and made by Gilbert! Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: tamsky

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: Very dirty looks like it was used and white sticky stuff all over it what cant be washed off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Ball is a bit slick at first, but becomes easier to grab hold of after it gets some use. Also the skull and crossbones on the ball look pure white in the photo but are more of a realistic yellow-brown "bone" color. All in all, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball as a gift for my daughter. Inflated it to the proper pressure and within 2-3 minutes it was soft again .
customer_reviews.author: Billr

customer_reviews.title: Just the right toy, at the right time...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is perfect for playing Ultimate Football with my fellow soldiers & we broke it in with wild abandon on this Saturday & for many games to come. A sizable ball with good gripping texture & the design is great. I'll buy an extra because I fear this one will come up missing!
customer_reviews.author: LORDBADACTOR

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for my other half. He is sure excited to practice with it for next year. It is unique compared to the standard gilbert ball
customer_reviews.author: Ambear406

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and inflated right out of the box without issues. The ball is actually much higher quality than I expected given the great price. Solid grip, excellent spin and flight and is holding up to very rigorous practice sessions. We use it for an ad hoc scrimmage RFC formed on deployment and it is serving us well.
customer_reviews.author: CPT G

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase until it popped prematurely. Not well made/put together.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome ball, only problem it leaks air out along the seem but that's not so much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Flores

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Received ball defective would not properly inflate leaked large volumes of air. When I contacted the company the customer service was rude unhelpful and over all nasty. Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: misty wavercak

customer_reviews.title: rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: The rugby ball is awesome.Its really well made and my nephew and his friends love it.I would recommend it for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: gen

customer_reviews.title: no problems
customer_reviews.text: good material air hole in skeletons mouth, cute idea. works great to play the game that is named rugby period
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it, it's defective
customer_reviews.text: There's no proper hole to inflate the ball, and it leaks air. Poor design and it's fifteen dollars for a reason apparently.
customer_reviews.author: J. Liles

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and grippy though
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold air for very long. It is nice and grippy though. I just have to pump it up before use.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this ball
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ball. It is not so good for night games, but otherwise it is is stable in the air and kicks great. The skull and crossbones do not hurt either.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Meehan

product_meta.title: Gilbert Elegant Violence Rugby Ball
product_meta.description: Gilbert Size 5 Supporter Ball with Elegant Violence design. Great for training, recreation, or display.
